resources.string: As a member, you are able to keep your own thoughts and feelings in a private diary or post them on our mini platform, talk with an Ambassador and help others.
As an ambassador, you are tasked to help the people that seek for it by giving advice, discuss and offer different activities, either daily or weekly, in a private conversation or on the platform.
We kindly request you to take the following test, consisting of 20 questions representing emotions felt in the last couple of weeks by choosing the intensity.
We request you to chose wisely between 2 and 3 domains of the following, based on his expercience up until now and professionalism. These domains will be shown on the ambassadorâ€™s account.
Start writing your thougths for today…
You have just completed an activity. See you tomorrow for more. Until then, here\'s your prize!
